Events that occurred on 13 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 89a.
1952 - C. S. Lewis writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien.
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Paul Barnetson.
1997 - Peter Jackson sends a parcel containing Forgotten Silver and Heavenly Creatures with a letter explaining an upcoming movie project to Alan Lee.
2002 - The South Park episode "The Return of the Fellowship of the Ring to the Two Towers" is televised.
2017 - Amazon acquires the global television rights for the books The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
F.A. 495:
Tuor, guided by VoronwÃ«, travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmo's message to Turgon.
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
